channel.title: Bolts model [ REQ ]
channel.description: Anyone have anytype of bolt model ??!!!

item.title: Bolts model [ REQ ]
item.dc:creator: @rockh4rd rockh4rd
item.description:
@rockh4rd wrote:

[code]if(i == 8140) {
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[6];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int[6];
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 17971;
class8.anIntArray156[1] = 5537;
class8.anIntArray156[2] = 5532;
class8.anIntArray156[3] = 5656;
class8.anIntArray156[4] = 5652;
class8.anIntArray156[5] = 10465;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = -29395;
class8.anIntArray160[1] = -29395;
class8.anIntArray160[2] = -29399;
class8.anIntArray160[3] = -29403;
class8.anIntArray160[4] = -29279;
class8.anIntArray160[5] = 12;
class8.anInt174 = 7994;// Item Model 16856
class8.anInt181 = 720;//model zoom
class8.anInt188 = -1;//Sleeves
class8.anInt190 = 477; //model rotation 1
class8.anInt198 = 117;//model rotation 2
class8.anInt169 = 3;//model offset 1
class8.anInt194 = 5;//model offset2
class8.anInt165 = -1;// Male
class8.anInt200 = -1;//Female
class8.aBoolean176 = true;
class8.aString170 = “Runite bolts (e)”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “Enchanted Runite Crossbow Bolts.”.getBytes();
}{/code]

just change the

if(i == 8140)

into the bronze bolt id[/code]

item.title: Bolts model [ REQ ]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Bolt models are 3135 and 3143 in the old 377 cache, think both are needed otherwise the animation is jerky.

Read full topic

item.title: Bolts model [ REQ ]
item.dc:creator: @alpha2 .alpha
item.description:
@alpha2 wrote:

[quote=“Rog3r, post:3, topic:229380”]And how would you do that ? :)[/quote]What, Recolor or find the model?
To find the model you just add bronze bolts to your items(if its not already there) and spawn one. To recolor you just need to right up some integers containing colors.

Read full topic

item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Bolts use no model, They are just a recolour of the Bronze bolts which are already in the 317 cache.
